issue.title: [C++] Support Substrait reading of a Feather-format local file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15900](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15900). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, Arrow Substrait supports reading a local file only in Parquet format.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15900?focusedCommentId=17506521) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12600
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12600>
